entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW AND RAIN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
